casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. MATHEWS
v.
MONTGOMERY. 2017-1255 Supreme Court of Ohio. March 14, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On respondents' motion to dismiss. Motion granted. Cause dismissed. On relator's urgent motion for emergency stay and motion for stay of proceedings. Motions denied as moot.
